thread.title: New Staffing Agency for the 55+ Market: InSynergy Staffing Solutions
thread.title_full: New Staffing Agency for the 55+ Market: InSynergy Staffing Solutions - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: New Staffing Agency for the 55+ Market: InSynergy Staffing Solutions
text:
InSynergy Staffing Solutions
NEW YORK , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Workers over age 55 represent 20% of the workforce in New York City – numbering over 700,000 – and growing to 25% the workforce in just seven years. Businesses and organizations looking to tap into this highly skilled and educated pool of workers 55+ have a new resource with the launch of InSynergy Staffing Solutions, a full- service staffing agency focused on placing these experienced workers in full and part-time jobs. Visit our website at http://www.fedcap.org/insynergy .
InSynergy is powered by the leadership of Fedcap, an organization with 80 years of experience in helping people achieve economic independence through workforce development and job creation. "We know how to put people to work," says Lorrie Lutz , Chief Strategy Officer at Fedcap. "We have built our strength on our valuable business partner relationships - but our greatest legacies are the lives we change."
Follow us on LinkedIn at https://www.linkedin.com/company/insynergy-staffing
InSynergy incorporates the power of Fedcap and its subsidiary ReServe –both workforce development leaders:
for the business partner , InSynergy offers a pool of pre-screened, experienced professionals with the skills and qualifications that meet business needs. for the 55+ worker , InSynergy offers job readiness assessment and resources for skills development, along with targeted job placement to match skills and experience. InSynergy represents a world of potential for both the older adult who wants to work, and for the organization that knows they need the leadership and career experience that these individuals will provide," said JoAnne D'Aleo, a business developer with InSynergy – and herself a 55+ professional. "There is no doubt that the 55+ worker brings experience and dedication to the job. Savvy business partners welcome the dynamics and the new synergies of the multigenerational workplace."
For more information, call JoAnne D'Aleo at 646.931.2331, or email jdaleo@fedcap.org
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/new-staffing-agency-for-the-55-market-insynergy-staffing-solutions-300160879.html
